DataElement.preferredName: Behavior Assessment System for Children Parent Rating Scales Response Pattern Index Raw Score Value
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric representation of the Behavior Assessment System for Children, Parent Rating Scales - Response Pattern Index Raw Score.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Behavior Assessment System for Children, Third Edition Parent Rating Scales BASC-3 Response Pattern Index Raw Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A comprehensive set of rating scales designed to facilitate the differential diagnosis and classification of a variety of emotional and behavioral disorders of children, aid in the design of treatment plans, and provide insight into an individual's thoughts and feelings. Version three incorporates additional questionnaires, scales and forms._The Parent Rating Scales is used to measure both adaptive behavior and problem behavior in the community and home setting in individuals aged 2-21._Detects two types of repeat patterns: repeated and cylindrical response patterning._A single score that is derived from a test or an observation and that has not been transformed or altered.

ObjectClass.preferredName: Behavior Assessment System for Children, Third Edition Parent Rating Scales
ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A comprehensive set of rating scales designed to facilitate the differential diagnosis and classification of a variety of emotional and behavioral disorders of children, aid in the design of treatment plans, and provide insight into an individual's thoughts and feelings. Concepts.longName: Behavior Assessment System for Children, Third Edition
Concepts.definition: A comprehensive set of rating scales designed to facilitate the differential diagnosis and classification of a variety of emotional and behavioral disorders of children, aid in the design of treatment plans, and provide insight into an individual's thoughts and feelings. Version three incorporates additional questionnaires, scales and forms.
The Parent Rating Scales is used to measure both adaptive behavior and problem behavior in the community and home setting in individuals aged 2-21.

Property.preferredName: BASC-3 Response Pattern Index Raw Score
Property.preferredDefinition: Detects two types of repeat patterns: repeated and cylindrical response patterning.:A single score that is derived from a test or an observation and that has not been transformed or altered.

Concepts.definition: Detects two types of repeat patterns: repeated and cylindrical response patterning.
A single score that is derived from a test or an observation and that has not been transformed or altered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity that represents the conversion of an individual score into a standard form made without knowledge of the population standard deviation and mean for the Behavior Rating Inventory of Executive Function.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.

Concepts.definition: A numerical quantity measured or assigned or computed.
